description: Discussed spring planting plans and seed requirements for 2024 season. Customer interested in trying new drought-resistant corn varieties.
Conducted soil test and consultation at Martinez farm. Recommended organic nutrient program for upcoming season.
Sent pricing information for bulk seed orders. Customer requested quotes for both conventional and GMO varieties.
Successfully delivered Order #1. Customer satisfied with product quality and delivery timing.
Customer called regarding specialty fertilizer requirements for vegetable crops. Provided technical recommendations.
Farm visit to assess equipment compatibility and delivery logistics. Confirmed spring delivery schedule.
Provided comprehensive quote for organic farming inputs including fertilizer, pest control, and soil amendments.
Consultation on sustainable farming practices. Discussed cover crop options and soil health improvement strategies.
Discussed fruit tree nutrition program. Customer interested in organic-approved products for orchard management.
Order #3 shipped via freight carrier. Tracking information provided to customer. ETA January 25th.
Account marked inactive due to financial restructuring. Will follow up quarterly for status updates.
Payment received for Order #1. Account in good standing. NET30 terms maintained.
